Question
========
  
A researcher measures five participants' scores on the Beck Depression Inventory. The scores are: 9, 12, 7, 15, 22. Calculate the sample standard deviation of these scores: 
Answerlist
----------
* 4.40
* 4.69
* 5.87
* 5.25 


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
